Plot: With all-new gadgets, high-flying action, exciting chases and a wisecracking new handler, Derek (Anthony Anderson), Cody has to retrieve the device before the world's leaders fall under the evil control of a diabolical villain.
Title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
Writer: Jeffrey Jurgensen (characters), Harald Zwart (story), Dylan Sellers (story), Don Rhymer (story), Don Rhymer (screenplay)
Actors: Frankie Muniz, Anthony Anderson, Hannah Spearritt, Cynthia Stevenson
tomatoConsensus: Young kids may find this London adventure fun, but older kids may find it too simplistic.
